thread.title_full: Gamesdeal.com reviewed by Scott Honda Mcfarlane

author: Scott Honda Mcfarlane
title: Scott Honda Mcfarlane
text: payed for the product 24 hours ago still no code, the support center doesn't seem to work properly as i have now attempted to follow the procedure to view my code as per the instructions and generate a ticket which also seems to not work. very poor service wont be using this company again.
